column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=First , I get in the bathroom and make sure that there is a clean towel .
#id=2
#text=If there is not , I go and grab a clean one .
#id=3
#text=Then I pull the shower curtain and start the water as hot as it goes .
#id=4
#text=While the water is warming up , and the tub is filling , I brush my hair out .
#id=5
#text=When the tub is filled , I get undressed , pull the curtain back and get in the tub .
#id=6
#text=If I am taking a bath for pleasure , I will put on some enjoyable music and light some candles .
#id=7
#text=If I am sitting in the tub for enjoyment I will relax and maybe read a book .
#id=8
#text=If not , I will wet my hair and apply shampoo and rinse it out .
#id=9
#text=Then i will apply conditioner and let it sit in my hair .
#text=While its sitting , I wash my body with soap , and then rinseout the conditioner .
#text=Before I leave the tub , I pull the drain and the shower curtain and run the shower to rinse off .
#text=I then turn off the shower , and wrap myself in a towel to dry off and my bath is done .
